thread.title: Mom Takes Autistic Son Shopping and Is Horrified at Anonymous Note She Receives
thread.title_full: Mom Takes Autistic Son Shopping and Is Horrified at Anonymous Note She Receives

author: Abby Heugel
title: Mom Takes Autistic Son Shopping and Is Horrified at Anonymous Note She Receives
text: 'I hope the next time they encounter a child that’s different, I hope they take into consideration that they don’t know anything about this person and they don’t have to be different on the outside to be different on the inside.'
